author: Staff Reporter
text:
Officials of the Hindu Religious and Charitable Endowment department at the Suchindram temple retrieved 2.5 acres of land worth Rs. 35-crore on the Railway Station Road in Edalakudi on Saturday.

Official sources said that the land occupied by an individual was identified by the authorities and was retrieved with police security.

Encroachment removed

Encroachment on the land was evicted in the presence of Joint Commissioner Lakshmanan, official sources said.

A committee formed to identify lands belonging to temples by the HR and CE department had so far retrieved Rs. 800-crore worth of lands in the district, the sources added.
title: Temple land worth Rs. 35-crore retrieved
